arts.ttl: Neymar speaks on reuniting Barcelona’s famed ‘MSN’ trio with Leo Messi & Luis Suárez
arts.sum: Former Barcelona star Neymar Jr. has this week spoken out on the possibility of linking back up with Lionel Messi and Luis Suárez at club level. Neymar is for his…

arts.ttl: Neymar in agreement with Cristiano Ronaldo over controversial Saudi Arabia comment
arts.sum: In the eyes of most, Neymar left elite European soccer when he joined Ronaldo and other stars in Saudi Arabia from PSG . Now, Brazilian star Neymar, who recently left France for Saudi Arabia, has joined the debate, backing the Portuguese star’s claim.

arts.ttl: Neymar news: Al-Hilal superstar drops HUGE transfer hint amid Inter Miami links
arts.sum: “When the news came out that I was leaving Paris Saint-Germain, the transfer window was closed in the United States, so I didn’t have this option (to join Inter Miami),” Neymar added. Neymar has admitted that reuniting with Lionel Messi and Luis Suarez at Inter Miami “would be incredible.”

arts.ttl: ‘Players in Saudi are better’ – Neymar echoes Cristiano Ronaldo’s Ligue 1 comments
arts.sum: Neymar (32) has echoed Cristiano Ronaldo’s comments regarding the alleged superior level of the Saudi Pro League compared to Ligue 1. The five-time Ballon d’Or winner claimed last month that…

arts.ttl: Neymar reveals interest in Inter Miami reunion with Messi and Suárez
arts.sum: The national team has struggled without Neymar and sit fifth in the qualifying table for the 2026 World Cup, winning only five of their first 12 games. Will Neymar play at the 2026 World Cup?

arts.ttl: Neymar Teases Possible Inter Miami Reunion with Lionel Messi and Luis Suarez
arts.sum: Neymar says it would be "incredible" to play with Lionel Messi and Luis Suárez again on Inter Miami.

arts.ttl: Neymar hints at ‘incredible’ reunion with Messi and Suárez at Inter Miami
arts.sum: Brazilian’s contract with Al-Hilal ends in June 32-year-old targets final World Cup in 2026 Neymar says reuniting with his former Barcelona teammates Lionel Messi and Luis Suárez at Inter Miami would be “incredible” as he approaches the end of his contract with Al-Hilal. The Brazilian struck up a lethal partnership with Messi and Suárez to lead Barcelona to the treble in 2015 before his record-breaking $230m move to Paris St Germain in 2017. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Neymar talks up Lionel Messi, Luis Suárez reunion at Inter Miami
arts.sum: Brazil forward Neymar has addressed the possibility of reuniting with former Barcelona teammates Lionel Messi and Luis Suárez at Inter Miami, saying that "football is full of surprises." The 32-year-old is contracted to Al Hilal until June 2025 and there has been regular speculation around his club future given his lack of playing time since joining the Saudi Pro League side.

arts.ttl: Neymar hints at reunion with Lionel Messi and Luis Suarez at Inter Miami
arts.sum: The trio formed a potent front three at Barcelona and the Brazilian would be keen on teaming up with the pair again

arts.ttl: Official | Marseille sign free agent Luiz Felipe Ramos
arts.sum: Olympique de Marseille have confirmed their first signing of 2025 with the arrival of free agent Luiz Felipe Ramos. The Italian centre-back had most recently been at the Saudi Arabian…
